name: CNMF-E
description: Constrained Nonnegative Matrix Factorization for microEndoscopic data
references: Zhou, P., Resendez, S.L., Rodriguez-Romaguera, J., Jimenez, J.C., Neufeld, S.Q., Giovannucci, A., Friedrich, J., Pnevmatikakis, E.A., Stuber, G.D., Hen, R. and Kheirbek, M.A., 2018. Efficient and accurate extraction of in vivo calcium signals from microendoscopic video data. ELife, 7, p.e28728.
